title: Have Questions? We Have Answers.
answer: Ease into the world of StyleLoom with clarity. Our FAQs cover a spectrum of topics.

faqs.question: How can I place an order on StyleLoom?
faqs.answer: Ordering is easy! Simply browse our website, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. Follow the prompts to enter your details and complete your purchase.

faqs.question: Can I modify or cancel my order after placing it?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, once an order is confirmed, modifications or cancellations may not be possible. Please review your order carefully before completing the purchase.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept a variety of payment methods, including credit/debit cards, net banking, and select digital wallets. Choose the option that suits you best during checkout.

faqs.question: How do I initiate a return?
faqs.answer: Visit our Returns page and follow the provided instructions. Ensure your item meets our return criteria, and our team will guide you through the process.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order is dispatched, you'll receive a tracking number via email. Use this number to track your package in real-time on our website.

faqs.question: Do you offer exchanges for products?
faqs.answer: At this time, we don't offer direct product exchanges. If you'd like a different item, please initiate a return and place a new order.
